name: compress_files_by_extension
description: Compress files with a specific extension into a ZIP archive.

source_dir.description: The directory to search for files. Default to './'

save_dir.description: The directory to save the output ZIP file, defaults to source_dir.

file_extension.description: The file extension to compress (e.g., '.txt'), defaults to None (all files).

recursive.description: Whether to include files in subdirectories. Defaults to True.
